article_text:
Durham coalition asks governor to expand Medicaid to an estimated 357,000 North Carolinians

Federal government pays 100 percent of costs for three years and 90 percent in subsequent years

McCrory has expressed interest in the expansion but has maintained the issue needs further study

article_metadata.title: Group presses for Medicaid expansion | News & Observer

og.description: With legislative leadership opposing Medicaid expansion, a local legislator believes events like a rally in Durham this week are important to reversing its stance.
og.title: Group presses for Medicaid expansion
